programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick and SpongeBob work at the movie theatre to watch a new premiere in 'Movie Stars', then in 'Dr. Smart Science', Sandy helps Patrick to host a science show. (S2, ep 5)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: The Star family gets trapped in the bathroom in 'The Commode Episode', then in 'Tying the Klop-Knot', Bunny and Cecil need to have another Klopnodian wedding. (S2, ep 6)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The kids visit the White House in 'Bringing Down The House', then in 'Mountain Hard Pass', an intense day of hiking in the Rocky Mountains sees the kids try to find reasons to stop the hike. (S7 ep 6)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Dad tries to one-up Mom's old crush in 'From Brad To Worse', then in 'Doll Day Afternoon', realizing Mr. Coconuts is missing, Luan rallies the Louds to track him down along Route 66. (S7, ep 7)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The Louds' road trip takes them to Hollywood in 'Screen Queen', and in 'Hide and Sneak', the Louds have to avoid the Casagrandes when they visit Great Lakes City. (S7, ep 8)

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures
programme.desc: News anchor Craig Woodman goes missing in 'Shirley P.I.', then in 'Please and Fang You', when the city's power grid overloads, Ave Empire must save the day - if he's not a vampire. (S3, ep 2)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Handy invents a camera for Painter in 'Say Smurf for the Camera!', and in 'Manners Matter', Papa Smurf is nervous about the Nature Fairy's visit, so asks Willow to teach the Smurfs manners. (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: Mice on the Run!: Boss, Blister and Scab are on the trail of three mice who ended up in the garden of Winston's villa. The Buffycats lend a paw to the daddy of the mice to save them! (S2, ep 22)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: Mara, the Hippo: A wooden crate falls from a running truck, and inside it is Mara, a small female hippo who was returning to Africa. The Buffycats help Mara get on the plane home. (S2, ep 23)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: Granny Pina's Birthday: Several birds that were outside in the rain are welcomed into the house by the Buffycats, but they begin to cause a series of disasters on Granny Pina's birthday! (S2, ep 25)

programme.title: Best & Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester don't look like their passport photos in 'Fight of Flight', and in 'Employee of the Month', Best wants to let his sister win, but finds that losing doesn't come naturally. (S1, ep 19)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Mr Krabs throws an event to boost morale, but Plankton is hosting his own on the same day in 'Company Picnic', and then in 'Pull Up a Barrel', Mr Krabs regales SpongeBob with tales from his Navy days.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob cares for the stray snails that start appearing around Bikini Bottom in 'Sanctuary!', while in 'What's Eating Patrick?', Patrick enters a Krabby Patty eating competition.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Summer School: To keep a planned vacation, the boys do all they can to stop Dave from learning that Alvin has summer school. (S5, ep 16a)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Puzzled: When Theodore drops a puzzle piece down a floor vent, he gets trapped inside while trying to fish it out. (S5, ep 16b)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Car Wars: When the Chipmunks get stuck in traffic en route to a show, tempers flare between themselves and other drivers. (S5, ep 17a)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Mr. Fix-It: Simon gets annoyed with everyone asking him to fix things so he decides to play dumb until he gets a "thank you". (S5, ep 17b)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Gary is given a set of limbs to keep up with SpongeBob in 'Gary's Got Legs', then in 'King Plankton', Plankton shrinks himself down and declares himself king of SpongeBob's aquarium.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lynn tries to control her future in 'Crystal Ballin'', and then in 'Most Dangerous Gamer', Lincoln and crew try to beta test a new game. (S9, ep 1)

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Fly: When Hazel has trouble adjusting to her move to Dimmadelphia, she discovers her neighbours, Cosmo and Wanda, are fairies! (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Better Off Wed: The kids learn that Dr. Colosso ruined their parents' wedding years earlier, and want to recreate Hank & Barb's dream day as their anniversary gift. (S4, ep 7)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Live & Dangerous, Part 1: Captain Man and Kid Danger are invited by a famous internet celebrity to attend his party, but they discover the party is not what it appeared to be. (S3, ep 19)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Brittany is hurt before a major school event in 'The Temp', and in 'Parent Trap', Bocarter's father helps him with his class project, so Alvin gets Dave's help, bringing heated competion. (S2, ep 18)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Theodore struggles to do good deeds in 'Knights', and then in 'Snake Charmer', Alvin and Simon create a fake snake to help Dave get over his fear of snakes. (S2, ep 19)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When Squidward is hurt on the job, he threatens to sue Mr. Krabs in 'Accidents Will Happen', and in 'The Other Patty', Mr. Krabs and Plankton find a common enemy in the new 'Flabby Patty' restaurant.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Instead of paying to fix a hole in the wall, Mr. Krabs instead opens up a 'Drive-Thru', and in 'The Hot Shot', Tony Fast Jr., the son of a famous race car driver, teaches SpongeBob how to drive.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln has to beat each of his sisters to get to the couch first to watch TV in 'Left in the Dark', and then in 'Get the Message', Lincoln rushes to erase a voicemail before Lori hears it. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln is tired of his sisters meddling until he's being picked on at school in 'Heavy Meddle', and then in 'Making the Case', Lincoln videos his sister's most embarrassing moments. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks
programme.desc: Theodore's new toy is annoying Alvin and Simon in 'Talking Teddy', then in 'Principal Interest', Alvin is none-too thrilled about going back to school, until he sees the new Principal. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks
programme.desc: Eleanor decides to move in with Alvin and his brothers in 'Sister Act', then in 'Lil' T', Theodore posts a video of himself rapping on the Internet and it becomes a mega-hit! (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Never Friending Story: Phoebe and Max worry that they will be stuck hanging out together all the time when their friends start to spend time with each other. (S2, ep 11)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Doubles Trouble: Phoebe signs up for a tennis tournament to win a membership at Link's family's country club. She enlists Max to use his powers to help, but her plans go awry. (S2, ep 20)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Captain Jerk: Captain Man attempts to boost his image by holding a contest where three winners get a tour of his secret lair. But Henry's friends are among the winners! (S1, ep 22)

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show

programme.desc: Lynn tries to control her future in 'Crystal Ballin'', and then in 'Most Dangerous Gamer', Lincoln and crew try to beta test a new game. (S9, ep 1)

programme.desc: Fly: When Hazel has trouble adjusting to her move to Dimmadelphia, she discovers her neighbours, Cosmo and Wanda, are fairies! (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob's House Party: SpongeBob buys himself a 'Throw The Best Party Ever' kit, and invites 177 of his friends along. But then he accidentally locks himself out of his house!

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Cookie Mistake: After Phoebe chooses Billy to accompany her to their favourite cookie factory's tasting event, Max and Nora are determined to sneak in first. (S4, ep 26)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: Hurricane Jonah: When a freak hurricane shuts down the island cricket match and blows away Uncle Charlie's journal, Taylor, Nori, and Ellis go in search of it, only to find a creepy house. (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: A Finata Full Of Death Bugs: When a dangerous pinata ends up at a kids' birthday party, Kid Danger and Captain Man must go undercover and step in before it's too late. (S3, ep 1)

programme.title: Victorious

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick build a golf course indoors in 'A Friendly Game', and then in 'Sentimental Sponge', SpongeBob has trouble throwing things away due to the memories attached to his possessions.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Du a Gwyn yn paentio dinas gyda help eu ffrind newydd, Llwyd. Black and White colour a city with the help of new friend, Grey.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ac anifeiliaid bach y byd ac yn y rhaglen hon byddwn yn dod i nabod y gorilla a'r sglefren for. In this programme we get to know the gorilla and the jellyfish.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Wedi i Guto gymryd un o blu cynffon Hen Ben mae'n rhaid rasio drwy'r cwm i geisio'i chael yn ôl. When Guto takes one of Hen Ben's tail-feathers, a wild chase ensues across the valley.

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: Pwy fydd y môr-ladron sy'n ymuno â Ben Dant a Cadi i herio'r byd y tro 'ma? From which school will these pirates come, to join Ben Dant and Cadi for a little adventure?

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd, ond pan mae o'n gweld pry copyn dychrynllyd mewn llyfr, mae o'n rhedeg i ffwrdd. Beth sydd i'w wneud? Today, Pablo is quite scared by a spider!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Ceir Cwl. Yn y bennod yma byddwn yn dysgu am bopeth sy'n ymwneud â cheir, ac ewn i Unol Daleithiau America i ddysgu am Henry Ford. In this episode we'll learn about cars.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Twm yn gwarchod ffrindiau blewog newydd... teulu o Alpacas! When the Alpacas Twm is looking after wander off, can he find a way to get them back?

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Bu Newffion yn holi barn plant ysgol Cymru am ginio ysgol, a chawn glywed lawer o hanesion difyr.Today, the children of a Welsh school tell us what they think about school lunches.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Y tro hwn - cyfle i'r Capten hwylio, i Fflwff ysgwyd gyda'r gwair ac i Seren ddod o hyd i ddarn diddorol o raff. A chance for the Captain to go sailing, and for Fflwff and Seren to play.

programme.title: Stiw
programme.desc: Mae Stiw yn rhoi cynnig ar ddosbarthu llythyrau a pharseli i'w deulu a'i ffrindiau. Stiw tries his luck at delivering mail to his family and friends.

programme.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
programme.desc: Mae Jen eisiau chwarae 'nyrsio' a daw ei chyfle pan glywir bod un o anifeiliaid y jwngl yn sâl. Jen wants to play 'nurse' and she gets a chance when one of her jungle friends falls ill.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd y cwn bach heddiw? What's happening in the Paw Patrol world today?

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Huw yn ymuno â Chlwb Achub Bywyd Llanilltud Fawr; cwrddwn â Hollie a Heidi a'u ffrindiau pigog; a bydd Meleri a Ieuan yn chwilio am pob math o adar yn Llanelli. Fresh air fun!

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Hwiangerdd draddodiadol am lwynog coch yn cysgu ac yna'n deffro'n barod am ddiwrnod hyfryd. A traditional lullaby about a red fox sleeping soundly before waking up, ready for another day.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae Dorti'n cael diwrnod rhyfedd wrth sylwi fod pawb yn ei hanwybyddu a bod popeth o chwith. Dorti is having a strange day, with everyone ignoring her and everything is going wrong.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Pan fydd mellt yn taro, mae'r dreigiau angen cario negeseuon yn ôl a 'mlaen ar y rheilffordd. When lightning strikes, it's up to the dragons to carry coded messages on the railway.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Crawc wrth ei fodd pan mae hwyaden fach newydd yn deor ac yn closio ato'n syth. In trying to rehome a duckling on the river, Crawc puts it in grave danger. Oh no!

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai as they search for a new shell for Cranc !

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Brown, y chwilotwr lliw, yn cyrraedd Gwlad y Lliwiau. Colour explorer Brown arrives in Colourland.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Awn i oerfel gogledd Rwsia i gwrdd â'r Walrws ac i wres anialwch yr Aifft i gwrdd â'r Sgorpion. We visit icy north Russia to meet a Walrus and to the desert of Egypt to meet the Scorpion.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mae Guto'n benderfynol o gael gafael ar y bwmpen fwyaf sydd yng ngardd Mr Puw. When Guto sets his sights on the biggest pumpkin in Mr Puw's patch, rolling it out of the garden isn't easy!

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: Pwy fydd y môr-ladron sy'n ymuno â Ben Dant a Cadi i herio'r byd y tro 'ma? From which school will these pirates come, to join Ben Dant and Cadi for a little adventure?

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd, ond nid yw o'n gwybod beth yw'r peth od sydd ar ei ben-glin - pwy all ei helpu? Today, Pablo discovers a scab on his knee and is a bit upset.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Byddwn yn dysgu am sut mae robotiaid yn gweithio. Teithiwn i wledydd pell fel Siapan, un o'r gwledydd sy'n creu nifer fawr o robotiaid. We learn how robots work and travel to Japan.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'r ffrindiau'n paratoi syrpries i Cain! Will everything go according to plan? On today's poptastic adventure, the friends plan a secret surprise for Fly.

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Bu Newffion yn holi pobol ar y stryd pa iaith mae nhw'n siarad gyda'u cwn, ac hefyd yn holi awdur sydd wedi ysgrifennu llyfr am y pwnc. Today, we learn about a rare bird in Llanuwchllyn!

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Cartrefi Cymru
programme.desc: Aled Samuel a Bethan Scorey sy'n edrych ar gartrefi Cymru drwy'r oesoedd. Y tro hwn, byddwn yn edrych ar dai o'r cyfnod Sioraidd. This time: a look at houses from the Georgian period. [SL]

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Ry' ni'n fyw o Wyl Triban ac yn edrych ymlaen at ddigwyddiad Ti a Fi Mwyaf y Byd. We're live from Triban Festival and look forward to the biggest Ti a Fi event.

programme.title: Hewlfa Drysor
programme.desc: Lisa Angharad a'r Welsh Whisperer sy'n mynd i Langernyw i gynnal cystadleuaeth i godi'r cythraul yn eu cynefin. We head to Llangernyw to see who will become car treasure hunt champions.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Prynhawn Da
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Dylan ar Daith
programme.desc: Dylan Iorwerth sy'n dilyn ôl troed Ifor Rees, diplomydd, ffotograffydd brwd, dringwr dygn, ac awdur llyfrau taith. Dylan Iorwerth retraces the footsteps of Ifor Rees to South America.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Gwyrdd yn llawn syndod pan mae Du a Gwyn yn cyrraedd ei choedwig. Green is surprised when Black and White arrive in her forest.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'r ffrindiau'n gwneud ffilmiau! Ond mae Pip yn cael trafferth meddwl beth i'w wneud. On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are making their own movies!

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Tra mae'r Dreigiau yn chwarae, mae gan Cadi brawf pwysig i'w wneud ar y rheilffordd. While the Dragons play, Cadi has an important test to do at the railway.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae Twm Twrch yn hoff iawn o wneud posau, ond nid yw bob amser yn gallu eu datrys - hynny yw, tan bod swyn arbennig yn ei helpu. A spell helps Twm Twrch solve some complicated puzzles!

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Mae pobol yn mwynhau casglu pob mathau o bethau, ond moch sy'n diddori Gwawr. People enjoy collecting all kinds of things. Today we meet Gwawr, who collects pigs.

programme.title: Oi! Osgar
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Oscar y fadfall a'i ffrindiau yn yr anialwch chwilboeth. A cartoon following the adventures of Oscar and friends in the arid desert - as they try not to die of boredom!

programme.title: Li Ban
programme.desc: Mae Mari'n adrodd stori am wrach y gaeaf, Caia Eira, a garcharodd Siriol tu mewn i'w mynydd oer, gwyn. Mari tells of the hag of winter who imprisoned Siriol inside her snowy mountain.

programme.title: Tekkers
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd. Heledd Anna, Lloyd Lewis a Huw Owen sy'n herio pêl-droedwyr i brofi eu sgiliau mewn 5 gêm bêl-droed yn stadiwm Tekkers. Ysgol Cwmbran face Ysgol y Wern in a footie game.

programme.title: New: Newyddion Ni
programme.desc: Newyddion i bobl ifanc. News programmes for youngsters.

programme.title: Cartrefi Cymru
programme.desc: Cyfres yn edrych ar wahanol fathau o gartrefi yng Nghymru. Yn y rhaglen hon byddwn yn edrych ar dai Eco-gyfeillgar. This time, we'll be focusing on Eco-friendly houses.

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Mae ffrindiau Anna yn mynegi amheuon am natur ei pherthynas gyda Miles. Jason and Dani find themselves in a bit of a pickle when an unexpected visitor arrives.

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Sgwrs Dan y Lloer
programme.desc: Heno, sgwrs gyda 'The Voice of Wales', Roy Noble. Clywn am ei blentyndod ym Mrynaman, ei yrfa fel Prifathro, a'i lwyddiant fel un o'n darlledwyr anwyla'. Tonight, a chat with Roy Noble.

programme.title: New: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Mae Adam yn rhannu tips am gadw'r ardd lysiau yn gynhyrchiol, a Meinir gyda Stifyn Parri yn ei ardd yn San Ffagan. Rhys Rowlands challenges our view of how we can use rhubarb in the kitchen.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Ffermio
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn am faterion cefn gwlad. Weekly countryside and farming magazine.

programme.title: Gwesty Aduniad
programme.desc: Mae Guto Williams wedi bod yn chwilio am ei deulu gwaed ers bron i ugain mlynedd ac yn dod i'r Gwesty i wireddu ei freuddwyd. Geraint reunites with Forest, a guide dog who was in his care.

programme.title: Yr Ynys: Fiji
programme.desc: Gareth Davies sydd yn mynd ar daith o lan y môr i berfedd y wlad i weithio, chwarae, bwyta a dathlu gyda phobl Fiji. Another chance to see Gareth Davies' visit to the islands of Fiji.

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae pawb yng Nghoedwig yr Olobob yn gyffrous i glywed Norbet yn dweud jôcs yn ei Sioe Ddigri, ond mae'r gynulleidfa yn anodd ei phlesio! Can the Olobobs help Norbet find his funny bone?

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Digbi'n gobeithio mai dyma ei flwyddyn i ennill 'Y Ras Fawr'! Digbi hopes that this is his year to win 'The Great Race'! But Glenys tells Teifion that she must win the race.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Ar ôl trip i'r sw mae Jamal eisiau gwybod 'Beth oedd yr anifail cyntaf erioed?' Tadcu reels out a silly story about a tortoise by the name of Darwen, the only animal that lived on earth!

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae 'na ben-blwydd arall yn yr harbwr heddiw - pen-blwydd yr harbwr ei hun. There's another birthday celebration at the harbour today - it's the harbour's birthday!

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn ôl gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back, with Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Pobeth, Dani Rheolaeth, Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa and Delyth Dylwythen.

programme.title: New: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae'r Whws yn deffro ar fore niwlog a'n meddwl bod Ynys Ddoeth wedi codi i'r cymylau. The Woohoos wake up on a foggy morning and think Wise Island has floated up into the clouds.

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Siôn yn perswadio Mario i roi cynnig ar fersiwn iachus o un o'i hoff fwydydd. Siôn persuades Mario to try a healthy version of his favourite dish.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Mae Siarlys a Sam wedi mynd i ffwrdd am benwythnos dawel i Ynys Pontypandy, ond dyw'r profiad ddim mor "dawel" a hynny. Sam and Siarlys go away for a quiet weekend to Pontypandy Island.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Mae Dela yn cael cymorth ei chwaer fach i ddatrys dirgelwch diflaniad rhyfedd mewn coedwig wymon. Dela teams up with her little sister to solve a mysterious disappearance in a kelp forest.

programme.title: New: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Daw galwad gan Gareth Potter y DJ a Lloyd - o na! mae eu seinyddion wedi torri. A call comes in from DJ Gareth Potter and Lloyd. Harri's help is needed as Gareth's speakers are broken.

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae'r Cymylaubychain wedi blino'n lân, tybed pam, a phwy sy'n gyfrifol? Why is everyone so tired today?

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae rhywun yn dwyn pethau oddi wrth Digbi a'i ffrindiau yn ystod y nos. Someone is taking items from Digbi and his friends in the middle of the night. Who could it be?

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Mae Iola'r iâr yn iâr swil iawn. A fedr Lleucu Llygoden, gyda chymorth ei chamera newydd, ei helpu? Iola the chicken is very shy. Will Lleucu Mouse be able to help her gain confidence?

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Mae gan Ben air 'abadobidii' arall i'r Abadas heddiw; 'trên stem'. Tybed pwy yw'r Abada gorau i fynd i chwilio amdano? Ben has another great word for the Abadas today; steam train.

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth i blant bach gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Pre-school science series with Tudur Phillips and his two friends.

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae Harmoni, Melodi a Bop yn mynd ar y trên heddiw. Allwch chi gofio swn y trên er mwyn canu gyda nhw ar y daith? Harmoni, Melodi and Bop are riding on a train today.

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae Blero'n mynd i Ocido i ddarganfod pam mae ei gysgod yn ei ddilyn i bobman! Blero goes to Ocido to find out why his shadow follows him around!

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd! Ymunwch â Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau lliwgar - gyda hwyaid yn dawnsio yn y bath, drws hudol yn y parc a chath yn coginio cacen. A new series of Jamborî.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Wedi i Jason ddyfeisio Pelydr Gwrth-Ddisgyrchiant ma Jetboi'n benderfynol mai ei declyn personol o fydd hwn. Jason invents an Anti-Gravity Ray and Jet-boy wants to make it his personal tool.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Y Castell sy'n ymuno â Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Y Castell join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae'r Olobobs yn clywed cân snwff swynol, ond bob tro maen nhw'n ceisio closio mae'n hedfan i ffwrdd. The Olobobs hear a lovely snoof song, but find it impossible to get near the creature!

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Digbi'n gadael pâr o adenydd i hedfan o dy Betsi ar ddamwain. Digbi accidentally lets out a pair of Betsi's wings and decides to get them back before she finds out.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Pwy oedd y person cyntaf ar y lleuad? Cyfle euraidd i Tad-cu ddweud wrtho mai ei fam-gu a'i ffrind Beti oedd y bobl yna! Hari's question today is: who was the first person on the moon?

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae radio'r Harbwr Feistr wedi torri ac yn anffodus, ni all gysgu heb wrando ar swn cerddoriaeth. The Harbour Master's radio has broken and he can't sleep without listening to music.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci nôl gyda chymeriadau newydd fel Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Popeth, Dani Rheolaeth, a'r hen ffefrynnau: Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa a Delyth Dylwythen. Cacamwnci is back!

programme.title: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae'r Whws yn gweld y lleuad yn diflannu'n sydyn ac yn meddwl bod rhywbeth yn ei fwyta! The Woohoos see the moon apparently disappearing and think something is eating it!

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae cawl newydd Siôn mor boblogaidd, mae'n rhedeg yn fyr o gynhwysion. Mae Izzy'n achub y dydd gydag awgrym blasus iawn. Izzy improvises when Siôn's new soup proves so popular it runs out!

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae Jams, Mandy a Norman gyda'i gilydd ar Arwr y Mynydd gyda Moose. Today, Jams, Mandy and Norman are together on the Mountain Hero with Moose.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Mae'r Octonots yn brwydro drwy gors i achub fflamingo bach cyn iddo gael ei ddal gan ysglyfaethwyr llwglyd! The Octonauts wade through a swamp to find a lost flamingo chick.

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Harri gets a call from Lisa and her father - their welding machine has broken and Harri goes to help. Mae Harri'n cael galwad gan Lisa a'i thad gan fod y peiriant weldio wedi torri.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Gwyliau Gartref
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd: awn ar wyliau byr yng Nghymru. Dau griw, dwy gyllideb wahanol: sut hwyl gawn nhw? New series. Two crews, two different budgets: who will have the most fun? First up: Brecon. [SL]

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Budgie
programme.desc: Louie The Ring is Dead. Stars: Adam Faith, Iain Cuthbertson & Lynn Dalby. Budgie meets his old flame Hazel and decides that it is time to make some quick money. [S]

programme.title: The Heritage Chart Show with Mike Read
programme.desc: A TOTP style TV Show for Heritage Artists based on the Heritage Chart which is voted on in over 80 countries. Songs you love from popular artists, live and on video with the odd interview.

programme.title: The Facts of Life
programme.desc: 1961. Comedy. Directed by Melvin Frank. Stars Bob Hope, Lucille Ball & Ruth Hussey. When their spouses drop out of their holiday, Larry and Kitty must prepare for the worst: each other's company. [S]

programme.title: Star Performance
programme.desc: 1953. Drama. Director: Robert Florey. Stars Ronald Colman, Elisabeth Fraser & Hillary Brooke. Whilst listening to his patients, a respected psychiatrist imagines himself within each of their stories.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: Reunion. 1959. Stars Rory Calhoun, Robert F. Simon & Richard Carlyle. After the surrender at Appomattox, Longley and two of his junior officers agree to reunite five years later. [S]

programme.title: The Larkins
programme.desc: Think Quicker, Vicar. 1964. Stars David Kossoff, Hazel Coppen & David Stoll. Lofty reveals the vicar's wife has left him and Ada takes a team of odd jobbers to keep an eye on his new housekeeper. [S]

programme.title: Juggernaut (1936)
programme.desc: 1936. Mystery. Director: Henry Edwards. Stars Boris Karloff, Joan Wyndham & Mona Goya. An evil doctor and the greedy wife of a rich man plot to poison him so they can get their hands on his money. [S]

programme.title: The Large Rope
programme.desc: (AKA: The Long Rope). 1953. Drama. Director: Wolf Rilla. Stars Donald Houston, Susan Shaw & Peter Byrne. A man returns to where he was accused of murdering a girl to prove his innocence. [S]

programme.title: Women Without Men
programme.desc: 1956. Drama. Directors: Elmo Williams & Bert Glazer. Stars Beverly Michaels & Joan Rice. Angie plans to meet her boyfriend on New Years Eve but winds up in jail. Can she find a way to get to him? [S]

programme.title: Star Performance: The Book
programme.desc: 1954. Drama. Directed by Roy Kellino. Stars David Niven, Marguerite Chapman & Douglas Fowley. An author's curiosity about a piece of paper found in a library book leads him to a group of spies.

programme.title: Clash By Night
programme.desc: 1963. Drama. Directed by Montgomery Tully. Starring Terence Longdon, Jennifer Jayne & Harry Fowler. A prison bus enroute to jail is hijacked by a gang determined to free their leader. [S]

programme.title: Someone at the Door
programme.desc: 1950. Crime. Director: Francis Searle. Stars Michael Medwin, Garry Marsh, Hugh Latimer. Ronnie and Sally discover that a secret passage in their new home is also a storeroom for a gang of thieves. [S]

programme.title: The Durant Affair
programme.desc: 1962. Drama. Directed by Godfrey Grayson. Stars Jane Griffiths, Conrad Phillips. When a wealthy society hostess dies, the search begins for the rightful heir, unveiling an unexpected heiress. [S]

programme.title: The Dark Road
programme.desc: 1948. Drama. Directed by Alfred J. Goulding. Stars Farnham Baxter, Cyril Chamberlain & Sydney Bromley. The story of Sidney Robertson and his rise from a petty thief to an underworld crime boss. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life There Ought To Be a Law
programme.desc: 1968. With Sam Kydd. A light-hearted look at some of the laws you never even thought existed, and their pitfalls.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Girl From Home. 1964. Buddy Ebsen, Peter Whitney & Muriel Landers. Lafe Crick arrives with his daughter Essiebelle, a beauty contest winner, with a plan to get her and Jethro together. [S]

programme.title: Scotland Yard
programme.desc: 1956. The Case of the River Morgue. Directed by Montgomery Tully. Starring Hugh Moxey, Gordon Needham and Jane Welsh. The police are summoned when a dead body is stolen. (S1, E16)

programme.title: Dixon of Dock Green
programme.desc: Legacy. 1976. Stars Tom Adams, Patrick Jordan & Carlos Douglas. After years in prison, Jack Montelbetti is released. He returns home, only to find the body of a jewel thief in his flat. [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Tidal Mill/Ice Fishing. 1986. After visiting Ely Mill, Jack recounts the story of his unwise attempt to win a bet by catching fish on a frozen Kent river in mid-Winter. [S]

programme.title: The Footage Detectives
programme.desc: We head back to class with a look at 60s school life, we have reels from the 40s on the dangers of fires in the bedroom, a thirst quenching film about orange juice and who remembers Puffkins? [S]

programme.title: Public Eye
programme.desc: 1973. Mystery Drama. It's a Woman's Privilege. Stars Alfred Burke, Pauline Delaney & Ray Smith. A pleasant visit from Marker's former landlady takes a turn when she tells Marker her problem. [S]

programme.title: Ship of Fools
programme.desc: 1965. Drama. Directed by Stanley Kramer. Stars Vivien Leigh & Simone Signoret. An eclectic group of passenger's board a ship bound for pre-war Germany, forming a microcosm of 1930s society. [S]

programme.title: What A Crazy World
programme.desc: 1963. Musical. Directed by Michael Carreras. Stars Joe Brown, Susan Maughan, Harry H Corbett and Marty Wilde. An East End lad, Alf Hitchens, dreams of hitting the big time in the music business.

programme.title: What A Crazy World
programme.desc: 1963. Musical. Directed by Michael Carreras. Stars Joe Brown, Susan Maughan, Harry H Corbett and Marty Wilde. An East End lad, Alf Hitchens, dreams of hitting the big time in the music business.

programme.title: Element of Doubt
programme.desc: 1996. Thriller. Directed by Christopher Morahan. Stars Nigel Havers, Gina McKee & Judy Parfitt. A woman has doubts about the loyalty of her husband and suspects him of playing a deceitful game. [S]

programme.title: Vintage Wine
programme.desc: 1935. Comedy. The family head of a wine company refuses to retire, but his family have other ideas. Starring Seymour Hicks. [S]

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Bill Thompson Gives In. 1955. Stars Hugh O'Brian, Hal Baylor, Denver Pyle. Wyatt uses Native American scouts in his efforts to locate a killer, which doesn't sit well with some Ellsworth citizens. [S]

programme.title: The Six Men
programme.desc: 1951. Drama. Directed by Michael Law. A story tracing the activities of a gang of crooks whose long run of successful coups has the police in a panic. Starring Harold Warrender & Olga Edwardes. [S]

programme.title: The Gambler and the Lady
programme.desc: 1952. Crime. Directed by Patrick Jenkins & Sam Newfield. Stars Dane Clark, Kathleen Byron & Naomi Chance. A gambler attempts to put his past behind him to impress a wealthy girl he has fallen for. [S]

programme.title: Battle Taxi
programme.desc: 1955. Drama. Directed by Herbert L. Strock. Stars Sterling Hayden, Arthur Franz & Marshall Thompson. A hotshot jet pilot must learn how to be a team player after joining a helicopter rescue squad. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Key of the Door
programme.desc: 1963. An intriguing look at the men and women of tomorrow who are needed to extend technology.

programme.title: The Mark of Cain
programme.desc: 1947. Crime Drama. Directed by Brian Desmond Hurst. Stars Eric Portman, Sally Gray & Patrick Holt. A young French girl instigates rivalry between two brothers when she marries the younger one. [S]

programme.title: Spare the Rod
programme.desc: 1961. Drama. Director: Leslie Norman. Stars Max Bygraves, Geoffrey Keen, Donald Pleasence. A new teacher arrives at an East London school to find that his modern education methods are not welcome. [S]

programme.title: Lorna Doone
programme.desc: 1951. Adventure. Directed by Phil Karlson. Stars Barbara Hale, Richard Greene & Carl Benton Reid. A love affair between a farmer and an outlaw's daughter develops with bitter-sweet results. [S]

programme.title: The Marked One
programme.desc: 1963. Crime. Director: Francis Searle. Stars William Lucas, Zena Walker & Patrick Jordan. Criminals kidnap a man's daughter in order to obtain forgery plates which they believe he possesses. [S]

programme.title: The Edgar Wallace Mystery Theatre
programme.desc: The Set-Up. 1962. Directed by Gerard Glaister. Stars Maurice Denham, John Carson & Brian Peck. A benevolent act on a train leads to something more sinister for an ex-convict. [S]

programme.title: Man from Interpol
programme.desc: Killer with a Long Arm. 1960. Stars Richard Stapley & Peter Vaughan. A gunsmith is killed in his own shop and a rifle with a telescopic sight is stolen. Agent Smith is sent to find the murderer. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Clock King's Crazy Crimes. 1966. Stars Adam West & Walter Slezak. The Clock King arranges for one of his trick timepieces to be sold to the Harry Hummert Jewellery Shop so he can loot it. [S]

programme.title: Dial 999
programme.desc: Commando Crook. 1958. Stars Robert Beatty, Richard Bird & Arthur Goullet. Maguire investigates a series of robberies; however, his prime suspect is a crook everyone believes has gone straight. [S]

programme.title: The Halfway House
programme.desc: 1944. Drama. Directed by Basil Dearden. Starring Mervyn Johns, Glynis Johns & Tom Walls. A group of travellers, all with something to hide in their past, take shelter from a storm in an old inn. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline Munro invites you back into The Cellar Club for a night of chilling films. First up, is the 1983 college based slasher The House on Sorority Row starring Kate McNeill and Eileen Davidson. [S]

programme.title: The House on Sorority Row
programme.desc: 1983. Horror. Directed by Mark Rosman. Stars Kate McNeil, Eileen Davidson & Janis Ward. Seven sorority sisters become the targets of a ruthless killer after an innocent prank goes horribly wrong. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline continues the night by returning to slasher territory with the 1989 horror Offerings; produced, written and directed by Christopher Reynolds. [S]

programme.title: Offerings
programme.desc: 1989. Horror. Directed by Christopher Reynolds. Stars Loretta Leigh Bowman & Richard A. Buswell. A young man escapes from a mental institution to get revenge on the bullies who sent him there. [S]

programme.desc: 19/35. Charlie and Lee are in Warrington to transform Bindu and Vivek's first garden into a productive, eco-friendly retreat.

programme.title: Sex Actually with Alice Levine
programme.desc: From Bournemouth to Dundee, Alice meets 'cam' couples who are monetising their sex lives by retailing 'authentic sex' online. Contains scenes of a sexual nature, nudity and strong language.

programme.title: Au Pair Girls
programme.desc: Seventies film following the misadventures of four female au pairs who arrive at Heathrow Airport and are whisked off to work for different families. Contains sexual scenes.

programme.title: Mary Millington: Confessions...
programme.desc: ...from the David Galaxy Affair. A playboy astrologer has to prove his alibi for a years-old robbery. With Mary Millington, Rosemary England and Diana Dors. Contains sexual scenes.
